metadata.description:
Candid fleeting moment capturing eye contact with the graceful Lady in Red

**Genesis piece, 1 / 1**  
Tallinn, Estonia, Sep. 2020  
Leica M6 TTL, Kodak Portra 800, 35mm film  

ðŸ”´ Wake Up â€“ we will look into each other's Eyes!

The **RED Thread** binds my lifetime works regardless of any contexts. The throughline making it all a coherent whole.  
An invisible red thread connects those who are destined to meet, regardless of time, place, or circumstance.  
The thread may stretch or tangle, but never breaks  

The collection comprises 108 unique images âœ¨   
Candid shots made on film, some are well recognizable in photography  

*Collector is eligible to claim limited edition signed A3 print 1 / 1 + 1AP  
**if the physical piece is not acquired, it will remain secured for the next owner who can obtain it from Author
